parting_gift.name: Parting Gift
parting_gift.desc: After you land a flourish, gain the ability to shoot bullets for 5 seconds. [Dual Gun]

armor_piercing_lht.name: Armor Piercing [LHT]
armor_piercing_lht.desc: [Guns] Your gun attacks now ignore 10% of an opponent's physical armor. Applied multiplicatively before PEN is applied.

bulletproof_lht.name: Bulletproof [LHT]
bulletproof_lht.desc: You take no Armor damage from guns. You take 5% less Armor damage from other sources.

armor_piercing_med.name: Armor Piercing [MED]
armor_piercing_med.desc: [Guns] Your gun attacks now ignore 10% of an opponent's physical armor. Applied multiplicatively before PEN is applied.

quick_swap.name: Quick Swap
quick_swap.desc: Massively reduce your bullet swap cooldown. [Dual Gun]

prime_ether_bullets.name: Prime Ether Bullets
prime_ether_bullets.desc: Your bullets take one less hit to proc elemental effects and now have slight intelligence scaling.

true_ether_bullets_lht.name: True Ether Bullets [LHT]
true_ether_bullets_lht.desc: Using Ether Bullets applies elemental damage of your highest investment.

bulletproof_ftd.name: Bulletproof [FTD]
bulletproof_ftd.desc: You take no Armor damage from guns. You take 5% less Armor damage from other sources.

hip_shooter_med.name: Hip Shooter [MED]
hip_shooter_med.desc: When wielded with a Medium/Heavy weapon, your side gun can now fire a bullet projectile. 5s CD

execution_hvy.name: Execution [HVY]
execution_hvy.desc: Your offhand gun attacks now count as flourishes and do a flat 20 extra damage when used with no bullets.

true_ether_bullets_med.name: True Ether Bullets [MED]
true_ether_bullets_med.desc: Using Ether Bullets applies elemental damage of your highest investment.

bulletproof_med.name: Bulletproof [MED]
bulletproof_med.desc: You take no Armor damage from guns. You take 5% less Armor damage from other sources.

quickdraw.name: Quickdraw
quickdraw.desc: Allows you to fire your offhand gun right after swinging. [Not necessary on dual guns]

hip_shooter_hvy.name: Hip Shooter [HVY]
hip_shooter_hvy.desc: When wielded with a Medium/Heavy weapon, your side gun can now fire a bullet projectile. 5s CD

gunpowder_blast.name: Gunpowder Blast
gunpowder_blast.desc: Pistol shots without bullets deal 2 extra posture. [Dual Gun]

execution_med.name: Execution [MED]
execution_med.desc: Your offhand gun attacks now count as flourishes and do a flat 20 extra damage when used with no bullets.

execution_lht.name: Execution [LHT]
execution_lht.desc: Your offhand gun attacks now count as flourishes and do a flat 20 extra damage when used with no bullets.
